page.index.title: AnpilogovPW — Frontend Developer Creating Clear and Fast Interfaces
page.index.description: My name is Artyom Anpilogov. I specialize in building fast, user-friendly, and maintainable web applications using modern technologies. I combine an engineering mindset with attention to interface details — making products reliable inside and intuitive outside.

page.contacts.description: Feel free to reach out to discuss a project or collaboration. Telegram, WhatsApp, email — always open for professional communication.

hero.title: Artem Anpilogov
hero.text: I specialize in building fast, user-friendly, and maintainable web applications using modern technologies. My work combines an engineering mindset with a keen eye for interface details to create products that are reliable under the hood and intuitive on the surface.
